snippet: After Andy Murray came back to beat Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals of the United States Open on Wednesday, attention turned, as it usually has for Murray lately, to Roger Federer. Murray detailed his rivalry with Federer, who later lost to Tomas...
abstract: After Andy Murray came back to beat Marin Cilic in the quarterfinals of the United States Open on Wednesday, attention turned, as it usually has for Murray lately, to Roger Federer. Murray detailed his rivalry with Federer, who later lost to Tomas Berdych.

headline.main: Conversations With Andy Murray: Federer Always Seems to Be Lurking
